abstract: Ben Kenigsberg reviews movie Tricked, directed by Paul Verhoeven.

headline.print_headline: Review: ‘Paul Verhoeven’s Tricked,’ a Documentary and a Farce
headline.main: Review: ‘Paul Verhoeven’s Tricked,’ a Documentary and a Farce

snippet: A film about a corporate bigwig whose former mistress shows up with a baby bump at his birthday party is preceded by a documentary about its making.
lead_paragraph: A film about a corporate bigwig whose former mistress shows up with a baby bump at his birthday party is preceded by a documentary about its making.
